name: Solar System (itch) (zzavcii)
description:
Hi everyone!

This is my Solar System Project. By clicking on the planets you can follow them and watch their routes. Have fun!

I added the following elements:

  • Mercury
  • Venus
  • Mars
  • Jupiter
  • Saturn
  • Uranus
  • Neptune
  • Additional Comets

Credits

Created by Zeynep Zehra Avcı
